mapper.select: select * from subject sj join subj_type st on sj.type_code = st.type_code join professor p on sj.prof_no = p.prof_no order by sj.subj_code desc
mapper.insert:
select subject_seq.nextval from dual
insert into subject(subj_code, prof_no, type_code, subj_name, explanation, credit, personnel) values(#{subjCode}, #{profNo}, #{typeCode}, #{subjName}, #{explanation}, #{credit}, #{personnel})
